name: Perspective (itch) (TDickson, NoahlSeymour, jblanch, KCPorteous)
description:
Perspective is a game where you play a person who is on the verge of speaking out about their sexuality. Armed with a camera you can follow the paths of others who have been in the same shoes and can peer into their pasts through the lens.

Created by:
Lead Creative Designer -  Noah Seymour

Designer/Project Manager/Audio - Jacob Blanch

Lead Artist/Designer - Trent Dickson

Lead Programmer - Kellem Porteous
